title: The Smellyphant
description: The SmellyphantAt the top of the hill, standing all on his own, Is a curious creature a long way from home...The Smellyphant is a wonderfully whiffy preschool level bedtime story for infants and children aged 3 - 6, and follows Samson, a lonely elephant in search of friends.Carefully crafted in such a way as to encourage little ones to join in with its bouncing rhyme, ‘The Smellyphant’ is an endearing and beautifully illustrated picture book tale about compassion, facing up to fears, and embracing the true importance of friendship.If you love the fantastic rhyming children's stories of Julia Donaldson and Dr Seuss, you'll love The Smellyphant, which ranked as one of Amazon's TOP 25 Most-Read children's ebooks (July 2015).Join The Smellyphant's Pong Parade Today!
author: Gavin Buckley
